title: The Maze, the Manor, and the Unicorn
description: A short story of banishment and magical intrigues.Cecily had been a lady-in-waiting. Exiled to Clearwater -- for her health -- after she angered Queen Blanche, she has nothing to do but wait.Until an ambassador is sent there, for his health, and Cecily finds that the court intrigues reach farther than she had known they could.
author: Mary Catelli
